Pep Williams bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto n'okporo ámá, onye nduzi, onye ọchụnta ego, na onye bụbu ọkachamara skateboarder nke tolitere na South Central Los Angeles, California
Ọ gara ụwa niile na-emepụta ihe maka ihe ngosi foto ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime naanị ndị na-ese foto ka e nyere ohere ịbanye na California State Prison System ebe o mepụtara usoro ihe osise ndị mkpọrọ akpọrọ, Behind Bars
Williams arụla ọrụ oge ụfọdụ na ụlọ ọrụ egwu na-arụ ọrụ na ngalaba A&R na akara ndị dị ka Death Row Records na Interscope Records
Mgbe e mesịrị ịbanye na foto, nzụlite azụmahịa egwu ya mere ka ọ dị mfe ịgbanwe n'ime onye na-ese foto dị ka ndị na-ese foto dịka; Chris Brown, Nick Cannon, Offset, na Suicidal Tendencies
E bipụtala ya n'ọtụtụ magazin ejiji, egwu, na ndụ dịka W magazine, Thrasher Magazine, Inked Magazine, Breaks, One West, Mass Ink, Urban Ink Magazine, wdg.
E gosipụtala ihe oyiyi ya na ụlọ ngosi na Japan, Portugal, Brazil, Germany, na United States ma ọ na-ejikọta ya na òtù ọrụ ebere dị ka The Art of Elysium

Ọgbọ nke atọ Dogtown skater, Williams malitere egwu skatị n'afọ 1975 mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ ma site na ntorobịa ya, ndị California skaters dị mkpa n'oge ahụ metụtara ya dịka; ezigbo ndị enyi Jay Adams, Christian Hosoi, Aaron Murray, Natas Kaupas, Julien Stranger, Eric Dressen, na Kareem Campbell
Williams n'onwe ya gara n'ihu bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka skateboarder n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, na-apụta na mkpuchi 1991 nke Thrasher Magazine, na ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi na ọtụtụ magazin na mgbasa ozi.
